Logging function. log( level , const char *format , ... ) is a macro around _log.

Parameters:
levelLogging level
fileFile containing the emmited log
funcFunction emmiting the log

CODE prioritynames[] [static]
Initial value:
 {
                {               "EMERG",        LOG_EMERG,                      "ERROR" },
                {               "ALERT",        LOG_ALERT,                      "ERROR" },
                {               "CRITICAL",     LOG_CRIT,                       "ERROR" },
                {               "ERROR",        LOG_ERR,                        "ERROR" },
                {               "WARNING",      LOG_WARNING,    "WARNING" },
                {               "NOTICE",       LOG_NOTICE,                     "SUCCESS" },
                {               "INFO",                         LOG_INFO,                       "INFORMATION" },
                {               "DEBUG",        LOG_DEBUG,                      "INFORMATION" },
                {               NULL,                           -1,                                              NULL }
}
